name: AlfredHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on living room lights.”
”Alexa, turn off living room fan.”
”Alexa, set living room blind to 30 percent.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alfred Home skill helps you safely control all the available features of your home. The most important functions always at hand. 

It offers you the control over lighting, climate and security. In short, make your life easier.

This skill is meant for Alfred Home users, and requires the users and password you registered with in Alfred Assistant cloud.
